unknown-class-prop.en-us: WARNING: "%s" doesn't have any known properties, Please submit an issue at https://github.com/HexaRG/lighting-profile/issues/new or update the API if it's outdated

duplicated-name.en-us: WARNING: "%s" doesn't have a unique name, automatically renamed to "%s"

plugin-button-create-profile-desc.en-us: Creates a new lighting profile from the current lighting

plugin-button-apply-profile-desc.en-us: Applies the currently selected lighting profile

plugin-warn-apply-profile-no-selection.en-us: WARNING: You must select a lighting profile

plugin-button-get-api-desc.en-us: Gives you the API required to use this plugin in your code
